statements: DELETE FROM market_reports WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown' AND market_trend = 'Stable';
DELETE FROM market_reports WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown' AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MarketTrends WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' AND property_value > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM InvestorReports WHERE investment_amount > 10000.00 AND neighborhood_interest = 'Waterfront';
DELETE FROM upscale_neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Beverly Hills';
DELETE FROM MarketTrends WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND market_value < 100000.00;
DELETE FROM PropertyValues WHERE last_sold_date < '2020-06-15' OR current_value > 500000.00;
